mensaje.asunto: You can already work with your class in {#NombreEcosistema#}
mensaje.texto: {p}Hello {#NombrePersona#},{/p}{p}Congratulations!Your request for the class {#NombreOrganizacion#} and the community {#NombreProyecto#} was accepted. To start working now, we recommend that you go directly to your {a href="{#Texto#}" target="_blank"}classes{/a} or {a href="{#Texto2#}" target="_blank"}communities{/a} and start the management inviting your students to your class.{/p}{p}Remember that you can find tutorials, FAQs and all kinds of information to work in your classes both in {a href="http://universidad20.gnoss.com/" target="_blank"}GNOSS University 2.0{/a} and {a href="http://educa.gnoss.com/" target="_blank"}GNOSS Educa{/a}. If you have any urgent question, feel free to contact us by phone 902 502545 (Spain) or through the Twitter channels {a href="http://twitter.com/universidad_20" target="_blank"}@universidad_20{/a} and {a href="http://twitter.com/educaciongnoss" target="_blank"}@educaciongnoss{/a}..{/p}{p}And a last piece of advice: we recommend that you stay tuned to these channels. Periodically we'll offer web seminars (webinars) with training in real time.{/p}{p}Thank you!{/p}{p}Enjoy {#NombreEcosistema#}! We innovate with you.{/p}{p}{a href="http://www.gnoss.com/en/organization/equipoGNOSS/see-bio/f3a5f0d3-84c8-412b-b0df-7813b31ccf95/"}The {#NombreEcosistema#} Team.{/a}{/p}

mensaje.asunto: You can already work with your class in {#NombreEcosistema#}
mensaje.texto: {p}Hello {#NombrePersona#},{/p}{p}¡Enhorabuena! Congratulations!Your request for the classes {#NombreOrganizacion#} and {#UrlEnlace#}, and the community {#NombreProyecto#} was accepted. To start working now, we recommend that you go directly to your {a href="{#Texto#}" target="_blank"}classes{/a} or {a href="{#Texto2#}" target="_blank"}communities{/a} and start the management inviting your students to your class.{/p}{p}Remember that you can find tutorials, FAQs and all kinds of information to work in your classes both in {a href="http://universidad20.gnoss.com/" target="_blank"}GNOSS University 2.0{/a} and {a href="http://educa.gnoss.com/" target="_blank"}GNOSS Educa{/a}. If you have any urgent question, feel free to contact us by phone 902 502545 (Spain) or through the Twitter channels {a href="http://twitter.com/universidad_20" target="_blank"}@universidad_20{/a} and {a href="http://twitter.com/educaciongnoss" target="_blank"}@educaciongnoss{/a}..{/p}{p}And a last piece of advice: we recommend that you stay tuned to these channels. Periodically we'll offer web seminars (webinars) with training in real time.{/p}{p}Thank you!{/p}{p}Enjoy {#NombreEcosistema#}! We innovate with you.{/p}{p}{a href="http://www.gnoss.com/en/organization/equipoGNOSS/see-bio/f3a5f0d3-84c8-412b-b0df-7813b31ccf95/"}The {#NombreEcosistema#} Team{/a}{/p}

{p}Dear friend,{/p}{p}we're sending you this communication to inform you that {#NombrePersona#} has joined the educational community {#NombreAsignatura#}. This experience is part of the project {a href="http://educa.gnoss.com/"}GNOSS Educa{/a} in which professors and students work together on their subjects in a private and safe environment.{/p}{p}If you have any doubt, comment or information to ask, you can contact us by {a href="mailto:{#CorreoSugerencias#}"}email{/a}.{/p}{p}Thank you for your attention{/p}{p}{a href="http://www.gnoss.com/en/organization/equipoGNOSS/see-bio/f3a5f0d3-84c8-412b-b0df-7813b31ccf95/" target="_blank"}The {#NombreEcosistema#} Team{/a}{/p}
